donatePage.title: Donate Us
donatePage.lead: Your support helps keep the content free and accessible. Thank you for considering a donation.
donatePage.oneTimeLead: Use the button below to make a secure one-time donation via PayPal. Replace the link with your PayPal donate link.
donatePage.upiLead: If you prefer direct transfer, use the details below. Replace these placeholder details with your real payment info.
donatePage.recurringLead: Consider monthly support via Patreon or a similar platform. Add your recurring link where indicated below.
